name: wasm-ros-communication
description: Due ambienti WASM che comunicano tramite ROS

scripts.build: emcc src/publisher_node.c -o public/publisher.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_init_publisher","_publish_message","_main"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall","cwrap"]' && emcc src/subscriber_node.c -o public/subscriber.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_init_subscriber","_main"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall","cwrap"]'
